column2: With the help of the local aldermen, I have implemented new and improved farming techniques in [Root.Location.GetName].

My liege, I bring good news from the province of [From.Location.GetName]. In my research, I have come across new farming techniques which would increase the crop yield of the peasants' fields. With the help of the local aldermen, these techniques have now been implemented across the province.
My efforts to improve the economy of [From.Location.GetName] have been hindered by peasant obstructionism. They are up in arms for what they believe to be a scheme to raise their taxes!

My liege, I regret that I must be the bearer of ill news. In my research, I have come across new farming techniques which would increase the crop yield of the peasants' fields. Despite the best of intentions, my attempts to implement these techiques have been met with suspicion and hostility from the local peasants, who are up in arms for what they believe to be a scheme to raise their taxes.
